item.title: Flower Delivery
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Flower delivery of your choice of Goon to cater your own experience.
item.content:encoded: Flower delivery from a goon of your choice. Specify context, from jealousy to a typical flower delivery service. Flower delivery will make you look like you have an admirer. If you have specific Goon in mind, please inquire on your cart checkout. Additional charges may apply.

item.title: Fireable Employee
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Make a scene and fire a fake employee to satisfy your own difficult customers. Available at hourly rates.
item.content:encoded: Ever have no one to blame? GoonSquad is here providing you with a fireable employee! You can make yourself look better by firing an employee to satisfy that difficult customer of yours. You can win their hearts so they can keep coming back! Each item purchased is up to an hour of service. Goon choices may vary.

item.title: Valentine Date
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Hire a Goon to go on a date with you on valentine's date
item.content:encoded: Going out but need a date? Want to make someone jealous? Feeling lonely? You can hire a Valentine Date to set your own narrative! From GoonGuys to GoonGirls, take your pick and go on a date. Please book in advance as some Goons may be in high demand. Send a message with your checkout to plan your date. We will get back to you at the earliest convenience.

item.title: Laughing Goon
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Hire a person who laugh on your worst jokes
item.content:encoded: Need some company? Making jokes but people just won’t get it? The laughing Goon will. This person will laugh in hardest way possible on even your worst jokes. Select your favourite Goon and they will laugh to set your own narrative.

item.title: Gamer Goon
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Gamer Goon willy be your friend to play games with you any time.
item.content:encoded: Life keeps people busy. Every once in a while, you have time to play games but your friends may not have the same availability. Sometimes it gets lonely playing by yourself Hire a Gamer Goon to play with you. Select Goons with your skill level and schedule a gaming session.

item.title: Goon Group
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Hire Goon Group to make your party look full and inviting
item.content:encoded: You can rent out Goon Group to fill up your party to make it seem like a lot of people showed up to your party. It will look more inviting and allow your friends to see how fun you are and how many friends you have. From parties to adventures, Goon Group is here to help. Party starts at $25/person per hour.

item.title: Chocolate Arrangement Delivery
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Sweet treat arrangements to make others feel jealous of your not-so-real admirer
item.content:encoded: Need to make someone jealous? Want to make it seem like you have a really big admirer? Specify your choice of chocolates and how to deliver them. You may also select a specific Goon to top off your interaction.

item.title: Queue Holder
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Hire a person to stand in queue and keep your place in line.
item.content:encoded: Sometimes, you need to wait in line but have other things to do. Hire a Queue Goon to hold the spot for you. Rates are applied hourly. For additional services, please give us a call to inquire.

item.title: Fake Fan Interaction
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Hire a Goon to pretend to be a fan of yours
item.content:encoded: The fans will show up to a location of your choosing and ask you for an autograph and/or photo. Depending on the situation, the client can request specific things for the fan to say during the interaction. Each package contains 3 Goons of our choice – for additional goons, please inquire by giving us a call.

item.title: Constant Caller Goon
item.dc:creator: nguy0890
item.description: Hire someone to constantly call your phone to give impression that you are a busy person and your time is important
item.content:encoded: The caller will call your phone every 5-10 minutes for the duration the client has paid for. The caller can call anonymously or with multiple phone numbers depending on the clients preferences. If the client answers any of the calls, the caller will either repeat a script given by the client or say nothing should no script be received.
